title: User Registration with Email and Verification
description: Verify that a user can successfully register using email and password, receive verification email, and verify the account.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Enter valid email and secure password
Submit registration form
Check that verification email is sent
Open verification email and click verification link
Verify user account status is updated to verified
User can log in with the registered credentials

title: User Login with Email and Password
description: Ensure users can log in with correct email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid registered email and correct password
Click login button
Verify user is redirected to dashboard

title: User Login with Google OAuth
description: Verify that users can authenticate using Google OAuth and access the dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Click on 'Login with Google' button
Complete Google OAuth authentication flow
Verify user is redirected to dashboard and authenticated

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Check that login fails when incorrect email or password is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid email or incorrect password
Click login button
Verify error message is shown and user remains on login page

title: Perform Love Spread Tarot Reading with Simple Type
description: Verify that user can successfully perform a Love Spread tarot reading with Simple reading type, correct credit deduction and results view.

steps.description: Login to user account
Navigate to Love Spread tarot reading page
Select Simple reading type (1 credit required)
Select required cards with orientations
Submit reading request
Verify reading result is displayed
Verify 1 credit is deducted from user credit balance
Verify reading is saved under recent activity

title: Perform Career Spread Tarot Reading with Detailed Type
description: Check the workflow for performing a Career Spread tarot reading with Detailed reading type, verifying correct credit deduction and form handling.

steps.description: Login to user account
Navigate to Career Spread tarot reading page
Select Detailed reading type (3 credits required)
Fill out any additional required form data
Select required cards with orientations
Submit reading request
Verify reading results are shown with detailed interpretation
Verify 3 credits are deducted from user credit balance
Verify reading is saved and visible in recent activity

title: Perform Single Card Tarot Reading with Written Type and Credit Check
description: Ensure Single Card reading with Written type (5 credits) correctly enforces credit availability and handles insufficient credits scenario.

steps.description: Login to user account with fewer than 5 credits
Navigate to Single Card tarot reading page
Select Written reading type (5 credits required)
Attempt to submit reading request
Verify system prevents reading due to insufficient credits and shows relevant error
Add or purchase credits to reach 5 or more
Retry Single Card Written reading
Verify reading completes successfully and 5 credits are deducted

title: Credit Purchase Flow and Payment Confirmation via Shopier
description: Validate the user credit purchase flow including Shopier payment gateway redirection, payment completion, webhook confirmation, and credit balance update.

steps.description: Login to user account
Navigate to credit packages section on dashboard
Select a credit package and initiate purchase
Redirect to Shopier payment gateway and complete payment successfully
Verify webhook is received and payment confirmation is processed by the system
Verify user credit balance is updated with purchased credits
Verify user is redirected back to success page on platform

title: Numerology Input and Interpretation Results
description: Check numerology calculation feature with user inputs and verify correct interpretation results are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to numerology feature page
Input valid user data for numerology calculation
Submit data for processing
Verify numerology calculation results and interpretations appear correctly

title: Tarot Card Gallery and SEO Optimized Pages in Multiple Languages
description: Ensure all 78 tarot card pages load correctly with detailed meanings, proper SEO tags, and support for Turkish, English, and Serbian locales.

steps.description: Navigate through tarot card gallery
Select different tarot cards and check content
Verify card details and meanings are displayed correctly
Check that SEO tags (title, description) exist and are correct
Switch language locale between Turkish, English, and Serbian
Verify tarot card content and UI text update appropriately with locale

title: Dashboard Data Display Accuracy
description: Validate user dashboard elements such as profile info, credit balance, recent readings, and statistics display correct and updated data.

steps.description: Login to user account
Go to dashboard page
Verify profile information matches user data
Check credit balance is accurate and reflects recent purchases and deductions
Ensure recent tarot reading activities are listed correctly
Verify statistics cards display accurate user activity insights

title: Admin Panel Access Control and Security Checks
description: Ensure admin panel is accessible only to authorized admins, IP whitelist enforcement, rate limiting, and role-based access works correctly.

steps.description: Attempt admin panel access from an unauthorized IP address
Verify access is denied
Access admin panel from whitelisted IP with authorized admin credentials
Verify admin panel loads successfully
Trigger multiple rapid requests to admin endpoints
Verify rate limiting blocks excessive requests
Attempt admin panel access with non-admin user credentials
Verify access is forbidden

title: Locale-Based Routing and Multi-language UI Verification
description: Check that selecting different language options changes UI text and routes correctly to locale-prefixed paths.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage
Switch interface language to Turkish
Verify UI text updates to Turkish and URL is prefixed with /tr
Switch interface language to English
Verify UI text updates to English and URL updates with /en prefix
Switch interface language to Serbian
Verify UI text updates to Serbian and URL updates with /sr prefix

title: Atomic Credit Deduction Verification
description: Validate that credit deduction per reading type is atomic and consistent, preventing negative balances even under concurrent reading requests.

steps.description: Login with a user having sufficient credits
Simultaneously submit multiple tarot reading requests requiring credit deduction
Verify that total credits deducted equal sum of required credits without allowing negative balance
Verify all readings are either successfully saved or failed gracefully without partial credit deduction

title: Responsive UI Layout Across Devices
description: Check that the user interface displays correctly and is fully functional on mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes.

steps.description: Access the platform on a mobile device viewport size
Verify UI elements are properly arranged, readable, and interactive
Access the platform on a tablet device viewport size
Verify UI adapts to tablet layout correctly without overflow or clipping
Access the platform on a desktop viewport size
Verify full feature visibility and responsiveness at desktop resolution
